plot: A human member of a defense force is given the life and ability to change into a giant super-hero to battle the monsters he encounters.
plot_en: A human member of a defense force is given the life and ability to change into a giant super-hero to battle the monsters he encounters.
plot_es: A human member of a defense force is given the life and ability to change into a giant super-hero to battle the monsters he encounters.
title: Ultraman
